Job.Description: She will sing for the customers.

LoseTrait.Text: ${name}'s having to sing every day has forced her to get over her Nervousness.
Singing in front of a crowd has allowed ${name} to finally overcome her Shyness.

GainTrait.Text: Her fame and singing skills has made ${name} an Idol in Crossgate.
Singing on a daily basis has made ${name} more Charismatic.
Singing on a daily basis has made ${name} more Charming.
${name} has become quite the accomplished Singer.

LoseTrait.Text: Professionally singing for so long has made ${name} lose her Tone-Deafness.

Message.Name: work
Message.Text: ${name} worked as a singer in the bar.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to sing in your bar to${shift}.

Message.Name: refuse.horny
Message.Text: ${name} let lust get the better of her and she ended up missing her ${shift} shift.

Messages.Message:
She sang
Goth Rock songs Death Metal songs Classical songs Metal songs Rock songs Country songs Pop songs
Pop songs Death Metal songs Classical songs Country songs

She must have the voice of an angel, the customers go on and on about her and always come to listen when she sings. ${name}'s voice brought many patrons to tears as she sang a song full of sadness. Wanting to have some fun she encouraged some listeners to sing-along with her. ${name}'s soothing voice seems to glide over the noise and bustling of the bar.
Feeling a little blue she only sang sad ballads today. You could swear that some customers were crying from the emotion.
The whole room was quiet when ${name} was singing. After she finished, the gathered listeners applauded for minutes.

She's unbelievable at this and is always getting praised by the customers for her voice. Her performance was really great, giving the listeners a pleasant time. ${name}'s soothing voice seems to glide over the noise and bustling of the bar.
${name} begun to acquire her own following - a small crowd of people came in just to listen to her and buy drinks
When ${name} got on stage the crowd went wild. She didn't disappoint her fans giving one of the best performances in her life.

Her voice is really good and gets praised by the customers often. Her singing was pleasing, if bland. Her voice was nice, if slightly untrained. She sang every part of the song clearly. ${name} is a really good singer. This wasn't the best performance of her life time, but in general she did well. She is good at this. With some work she could be a star. The slow song ${name} sang at the end of shift really had her full emotion and heart.

She hits a few right notes but she still has room to improve. While she won't win any contests, ${name} isn't a terrible singer. She didn't sing every part clearly but overall she was good. Maybe she isn't the best but at least she doesn't scare away the customers.
The slow song ${name} sang at the end of shift really had her full emotion and heart. A pity she was bored and tired.

She almost never hits a right note. Lucky for you most of your customers are drunks.
Her singing is barely acceptable, but fortunately the bustling of the bar drowns ${name} out for the most part.
After hearing today's performance, you order your guards to gag her for a week. Some customers left immediately after ${name} started to sing. ${name} singing was awful. Not a single line was sung clearly. ${name}'s voice is all over the place as she sings.

Her voice sounds like nails on a chalk board. She could be the worst singer ever. It's tragic, ${name} really can't sing. ${name} singing was awful. Angry listeners throw random objects at her. Hearing ${name}'s singing gave you a thought to use it as a new torture method. ${name} bellowed out a melody that caused the bar to go into a panic clearing it quickly.
Her audience seems paralyzed, as if they couldn't believe that a human body could produce those sounds, much less call them "singing".
She is just $[terrible|horrible|awful]. You could swear that your singing under the shower is far better.
${name} was the first to get on stage before today's star performance. Seeing the gathered crowd, she froze up being able to let out a single word.

Message.Name: post-work-text
Message.Text: Stunned by her beauty a customer left her a great tip.
Her charisma shone through as she chatted to customers between songs.
Her clumsy nature caused her to trip coming on stage causing the crowed to go wild with laughter. She went to the back and hide refusing to take the stage for her song set.
Message.Group:
<Text Condition="Performance<130" Updates="Tips-=10" > Her pessimistic mood depressed the customers making them tip less.
${name} was in a poor mood so the patrons gave her a bigger tip to try and cheer her up.

<Text Condition="Performance<130" Updates="Tips-=10" > ${name} was in a cheerful mood but the patrons thought she needed to work more on her on her singing.
Her optimistic mood made patrons cheer up increasing the amount they tip.
Message.Text: She knew just what songs to sing to get better tips by using her Psychic powers.
Message.Group:
<Text Condition="Performance<160" Updates="Wages-=50" > A patron booed her. She saw red and using her Assassin skills killed him instantly. Other patrons fled out without paying.
A patron booed her. But was drunk and started crying a moment later so she ignored them.

<Text Condition="Performance<160" > A patron gasped and pointed at her Horrific Scars making her uneasy. But they didn't feel sorry for her.
A patron gasped and pointed at her Horrific Scars making her sad. Her singing was so wonderful that at the end of the performance they personally apologized and thanked her, leaving her a good tip.

Group.Text: Today a large group of ${name}'s followers came to listen to her sing, leaving very generous tips behind.
${name} is quite popular in Crossgate so a small crowd of people came in just to listen to her.

Message.Text: A group of ${name}'s fans came to listen to her sing, leaving good tips behind.
